subject: Re: skeptic: My response on Wiltshire Group site
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Crap, I forgot, this is still Steve and Bruce's group, they are the 
real EVP experts, just ask, they'll tell ya. I mean, geeze, Steve has 
what, six months experience?

 There is always these little clowns that want to show off to the 
world, and claim they are to only experts.


  I've had enough!

 F-S

like

shot as

anything

to a

frank's
